name: Helltour Cross Country
description:
Race through the ravaged post-apocalyptic wasteland and make friends along the way!

Steer with ASDW
Aim with the mouse,
Shoot with Left Click, Brake with Right Click.
Brake near hitchhikers to speak with them!

a Game made by
Askiisoft, Francis Coulombe, cBoyardee,
Lurdiak, LordMo, and excommunicator

for the Toronto Game Jam!
